articles.title: European farmers angry at climate policies could help sway EU parliamentary elections - NPR
articles.description: Farmers in the European Union could hold the key to the bloc's parliamentary vote.

articles.title: Narendra Modi condemns attack on Danish PM Mette Frederiksen: ‘Deeply concerned by the news’ - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The assault comes amid the EU parliamentary elections in Denmark and follows recent violent incidents involving European political figures. | World News
articles.content:
Prime Minister-designate Narendra Modi on Saturday condemned the attack on Danish PM Mette Frederiksen, who was hit by a man in Copenhagen.
